verbose_text: Heterologous expression of AtVIT1, OsVIT1, OsVIT2 and TgVIT1 in the Deltaccc1 mutant has been shown to complement the Deltaccc1 mutation by restoring Fe uptake into the vacuole, and thus, to protect the cell from the deleterious effects of high cytosolic Fe (XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: expression of AtVIT1, OsVIT1, OsVIT2 and TgVIT1
